content.detailedDescription:
Forest, ontario. october 20, 2008. 22:30 hrs. edst.

   witness (c.C.) was outside walking her dog when a distant bright object caught her attention. it appeared to be a bright white glowing ball, with fuzzy edges or an aura, about the size of the moon.
   she continued to watch the object move slowly (2 mph?) over the town, while continuing her walk. when the object passed over the nearby royal bank at a height of approximately 100 feet, she realized it wasn't an airplane or helicopter (silent, no blinking lights), so she ran back to her home to get a pair of binoculars. by the time the witness ran back outside, the object had disappeared.
   c.C. felt excited and confused (seeing things?)after her sighting.
content.summary: Bright white ball of light moving slowly over town.

content.detailedDescription:
"narrative below was submitted by mufon dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness".

at approximately 1:25am i went outside and saw a flash of light near an aircraft in the clear night time sky. i could see a pink star with the naked eye. i looked through my binoculars and could see a craft with blue-white spinning lights under the craft. it was traveling then stopped, then started traveling again. i felt there was telepathic communication with the occupants.
content.summary: Saw craft through binoculars.

content.detailedDescription: i work nights so had woke up in the evening. i was up for about 10 mins for some reason i had a feeling to look out the window in my room and i knew for some reason i was going to see somthing. soon as moved the blinds there was this silver ball flying over my neighborhood. i was surprised by this object i thought at first maybe it was balloon but it has no markings and it was perfectly round. it seemed to pick up speed when i saw it. so i grabbed my camera and ran out front and took some pics of it but it seemed to speed up and gain alltitude till it was to far to dicern in the blue sky.  im not sure what it was..
content.summary: Silver ball shape no markings

content.detailedDescription: In the old market with girlfriend and two friends at night. looked up at it, and it was making zig zag lines for approximately three minutes. when tried to take a picture of it with a cell phone camera, it disappeared completely, leaving a green streak of light. during the time that it was zig zagging, it moved very quickly, but remained in one short space. looked around for a few minutes afterward in all directions to try to relocate it, but could not find it or anything similar to it anywhere else in the visible sky.
content.summary: High flying green colored object making zig zag lines that disappeared before photo

content.detailedDescription:
Just to let you know....I take photo's of ufos daily and i post them to 
www.Myspace.Com/jimmywenger click on pictures....I post weekly so stay tune...
content.shape: Circle,  Diamond,  Disc,  Fireball,  Flash,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Teardrop,  Triangle,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Photos of ufos

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog accross a small open field near our home  i was ten years old at the time, the hair on the back of my neck stood up and the dog ran under a bush. out of the corner of my eye i saw something or somebody near the bush, suddenly i was bathed in light from above, there was a small lighted orb darting above that seemed to change size and shape 'it got bigger and the light was blinding and i felt heat. it hovered right above me and i remember thinking how quiet it was. then the thing by the bush turned into a smaller orb about the size of a basketball and shot into the air towards the big orb which started pulsing they merged, pulsed real bright,then vanished in a streak.Then my dog came out it was trembling and had a round burn on his nose like a car lighter would leave and the tip of his ear was missing but not bleeding.  when i pulled myself togeather we ran home and told my family and everyone laughed even when they saw the dogs was hurt. my parents tried to convince me that the dog tangled with a raccoon but i know what i saw and the dog would pull back and refuse to walk that way also the scars remained until he died at a very old age. about a week after i saw the orb i started feeling things, and even now i can sit in a crowded restaurant and haer what everyone at the tables around me are talking about. i also can play the piano and organ by ear and  can see auras and the list goes on. i also have had this feeling of expectation which grows stronger the older i become, i am now 57 years old now and there is not enough room to write all the things that have happed since tha night.
content.summary: orb

content.detailedDescription: I have witnessed the same orb that is report in ny about a green light coming down on 08/21/09...It couldn't be a meteor...It was huge and it had this strange color...I have to say i was a witnessed of another report filed a few months ago about another strange green light that crossed manhattan in a incredible speed..I have seen strange objects in ny's skies...People should look up more ...Not only accidents are happening over the hudson river...Something is happening and we are not aware of that...
content.summary: I saw the same thing last night.

content.detailedDescription:
Orange ball-[corrected]

   approaching the top of hill street (looking up) i noticed a descending orange ball atop pa rte 247 headed toward the little league municipal ball park hidden in the very low lying storm clouds as it had down poured 3 hours earlier that evening as said clouds were up against this area of moosic mountain and it was about to down pour again.
   the low lying clouds appeared as a dense light grey fog and the orange ball was floating downwardly glowing like a descending parachute with a flare attached like used in the military.
   my first thought was it ti be an approaching plane headed into the scranton/wilkes-barre international airport upon clearing the archbald salem mountain (elev 2200')omni guidance tower, but orange ball was under (elev 2000')the norm for such approaching air traffic.
   i waited for it to change direction from east to south west, usually done at this point; however! it never did? i then realized that this was something different!
   when i stopped at the last stop sign the clock was 9:14 pm luppini time (found only in jessup, pa). i traveled about 600 feet or so and pulled over just as anothe car passed me parking across from an inspection garage station.
   i got out of the car as the orange ball was descending toward the ball park's high tension power line that cut right throught the middle of the three field stadium.
   i could hear an electronic type crackeling (like a mosqueto zapper)uninterupted as it approached in the still quiet night.
   luckily a sliver opened up in the dense clouds giving me a clear view.
   the orange ball was heading toward the top of the high tension tower lines for sure.
   i was now looking straight up under the orange ball as if it was an ultra-lite aircraft.
   it was stepping downwardly by going forward and slightly upwardly in a floating jerking type motion out about fifty feet or so and then dropping down rappedly on a very steep slope 70 or 80 ft. or so and then stopping (similar to a mountain climber descending a very steep incline).
   it was aware of my presene and acted extremely cautions! i observed this repitive process for about 8 to 10 descending downward steps as it now had come down to about elevation 800' and was still descending.
   i rushed back into the car's back seat to retrive an old camera on the floor in a box with other materials finding the 35 mm camera and immediately tried to get a shot unable to see well enough to properly focus an set it in the dark.
   i missed the orange ball at its lowest point because it was now stepping back upwardly at a very steep angle as i tried to take the shot!
   while attempting a second shot the down pour let lose unbelievably!
   the clouds immediately closed the sliver type opening as i dove in the car with camera all wet.
   when first observed the orange ball appeared to be about 1/2 the size of a car(2,000' elev) and then at the low point (500'elev.) it appeared to be jus about the size of a car.
   it was kinda of multi layered colored as follows: 1)black nose in front, 2)then dark red behind that, 3)then bright red behind that, 4)then dark orange behind that, 5)then bright orange behind that, and finally 6) extremely bright bright white light behind that!
   it made no noise with exeption for a crackling and moved in a slow floating type motion very cautiously.
   as i think it was gathering all available emfs from atop the high tension electrical power lines maybe like recharging itself!
   others last 4th of july (2008) reported it both before and after the comunity fire works display withh 4-5 witnesses in each group.
   over the past 40 years their have been numerous white blob sightings usually under elevation 200'in the upper lackawanna river basin.
   i felt as if it was alive as it acted like an animal being feed from your back porch steps as it was so timmed and caution and careful probably due to poor visibility and trying to avoid contact with the high tension power lines but had to recharge or maybe die!
   i only wish i had my binoculars as i could have really seened the details at it lowest point estimated a 400 feet.
   i then went down hill street to the convient mart to see if the cops were on their coffee break but! no one was to be found.
   i then proceede to frank's in simpson for a late snack, another area where some type of ufos seem to come and go up the lackawanna river basin toward the head waters in arart, pa their apparant area of interest when traveling through!

   the total time of this sighting was about 5 minutes.

joseph r. caterina, pe
c/o 419 simpson street
peckville, pa 18452
content.summary: Orange ball

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke suddenly... thouht or just knew something was going on out in front of my house.I opened the front-door,stepped outside to 
one disc-shaped bronze colored craft landing in the street(30ft.Away) the door opened about half-way...I then looked up to see anather cigar-shaped polished-bronze craft flying through the air.It also had several round windows.With three eartlings on board.I one of the motioned for me to look up above their craft with his unlit cigar.I think he wanted me to check out the little white lights above the cigar shaped object.I also think he letting me know he wasin charge of the lights...But the the guy in front of him (in the next window forward) was doing the actual flying.Then i heard aloud noise only to look over at the other crart taking off with fire erupting from underneith it. i then relized i needed to "hit-the-deck" or i was going to be engulfed in fire still coming towards me...I ran to the shelter of my partly open sliding garage door,just managing to get it closed when i was hit with the heat from fire from underneith the second windowless craft.I at the time thouhgt that i was maybe gonna die.But,soon just got up.I noticed now it was ouite calm.I then went back up on the pourch and was shown a couple of differrant other types of "craft".More stuff or events happened as well.I might report at another time.But i thought you may enjoy this report as is. if, any one is interested i be happy to complete this story...
content.summary: I walked outside front door,saw 2 craft up close.1 cigar,1 bronze disc@ 30ft/

content.detailedDescription:
At aproximately 0500 hrs on 08.16.2009 while unsecureing factility doors i was mentioning to a co-worker about how bright jupiter was in the sky, southern sky of my location. i had a set of binoculars in the crusier. 

moments later i noticed out of the corner of my eye when i was returning the binoculars to the cruiser that what apeared to be a star but it was moving, upon a second look i could determine that the star-lit object was  at an extremely high altitude, i want to say at a normal airliner cruseing altitude(30,000feet?). about a mile to the right of the object was a commercisal airliner traveling in the same direction, althought it's identification lights were clearly visable. the object quickly passed the airliner and moved from west horizon to east horizon in aproximately 4 minutes. the object made no noise, even the airliner at crusing altitude made some noise as it passed overhead.

the object made no turns, or altitude changes to our knowledge. the night was cloudless with no moon untill 0530hrs.

the object even thru the binoculars could not be distingushed to have a fuselage or identifying parts. it was an orange glowing starburst. no pulseing just a steady light as it passed.

we lost sight of the object as it went over the horizon line.

attempts to capture images of the object proved futile on a camera-phone.
flir was unable to pick out the object from the night sky.
content.summary: Orange star-like light passes over wilkes barre from west to east

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on 71 highway traveling north from blue ridge exit headed toward the grandview triangle.I was traveling with my son, daughter, and a friends son. looking forward. i noticed what looked like a shooting star coming down high in the sky and possibly twenty to thirty miles north of our location( possibly close to worlds of fun). i pointed the object out to the kids as a shooting star. as it descended at a steady rate i slowed down to observe the object. the object the appeared to split into three separate lights that began to descend side by side. the distance appeared to be equal between each light. pulling off the exit i looked up again to see them in a triangle formation. they then began to change formation as a forth light appeared at the top of the new crescent formation. i continued to drive toward 435 and bannister rd. i could get a glimpse of a bright light at each opening that wasn't blocked by the roadways or lines of trees in the horizon. i exited 435 an 87th street. i stopped and stared at the light that i could see for approximately 45 seconds.It did not move. i began to continue to search for the light, but turned around toward home, as a request of my son. i could not identify what i saw, so i thought it would be wise to report it in case others have seen the objects as well.
content.summary: Star like and teardrop shaped that broke into three, then a triangle, the a cresent with four lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on grand avenue, baldwin ny, when i noticed a green flash to my left.  initially i thought it was a reflection from the stop light.  i slow the car down and looked up and to my left and watched as this green ball of light shot across the sky and disappeared over the trees.  i turned off the main road hoping to bypass the trees, but it was gone.  i expected to hear some sort of explosion but did not.  i've seen strange things in the sky, but this had to be one of the most amazing!  i came home and immediately accessed the internet to find out if anyone had seen anything like this in the past.  i found one image that was similar, though not as large or exactly the same color.  another article describes a similar object and said it was a meteorite.  i've seen shooting stars, meteor showers but nothing like the object i witnessed this evening.
content.summary: Large green glowing orb.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed movemen in sky while driving home on i-80 e between american canyon and fairfield, ca. looked up and saw shiney disc flying at high speed over power lines on south side of freeway. visually followed disc as it crossed over the freeway heading north east. looked around and saw other people watching and pointing at it, too. i hurried to take the green valley exit to make it home and grab my binoculars. last seen heading towards vacaville area. i ran back outside with binoculars, but it had gone over the hills and was out of sight. simply amazing and so exciting to see! incidentally, a sceptic might claim it to be an airplane shining in the sun - coming from the west - behind me. i got a clear look at it, however, and saw it to be disc shaped and moving at a velocity no fighter could have matched. i'm retired usaf and know a plane when i see one. there is a lot of air traffic nearby, but this was unlike anything akin to a plane... wrong shape, shiney white, and moving incredibly fast.
content.summary: Extremely bright, shiney white. moving ne at high velocity over i-80 e.

content.detailedDescription:
hi my name is steve, i and some friends were outside at our shop in rural sw florida. it was a very clear night & as i tended to my work i kept noticing a white streak pointing due west. i did not (at first) notice the movement until i stopped and called attention to the object high in the sky. we watched for a while and no one had any idea as to what it was. we have occasionally witnessed the silver clouds pass by after a shuttle launch ( the fuel leaves an aluminum residue from launch rockets fuel) but this was nothing like that. i called my brother eight miles away to go and look as well. we both got out binoculars and watched as it flew by. 
it took about forty or so minutes in all before it was out of my sight. i did not even think to get my camcorder and get pictures as i was spellbound by what everyone was seeing. the sighting was not what affected me but what was going on in the fantail ( for lack of a better word)of the craft or crafts as we ( my brother & i) saw white or silver dots moving rapidly about within the plume behind the point or front. as one moving dot matched the front for a short time and did a 270 degree about face back into the plume and immediately returned to its previous position at the front. i have been around aircraft all my life and i do not know of anything capable of these abrupt and very quick direction changes much less the speeds they were going. at that time a cluster of flashing lights or explosions went off where the large part of the plume or fantail was. there were other smaller moving white dots in the frey going in all different directions (i can relate this to a scene from star wars when luke was watching his fleet get annihilated). sort of what a cluster bomb would look like when exploding in air. my brother and i saw this through 70 power binoculars and could see very sharp details. everyone else had no visual augmentation but could see clearly what was up there. 
 whatever was happening had nothing to do with this planet as it was so large and so far out. we could see other local aircraft from the airport at different altitudes. i'm no dummy and i know some truth about reality. i file this report to get this off my chest. i want everyone to know. 
thank you, steve
content.summary: It appeared as a fanned out double sided horizontal plume with much actitity about it as it traveled.

content.detailedDescription:
The large redish orange fireball rose up very slowly above a mountain ridge to the west as i drove southward toward las vegas to the east of death valley in nevada.  the fireball appeared to be dripping liquid fire.  the fireball seemed to move southward with me for about five minutes and then slowly decended back down behind the huge mountain top.

i heard about a week later that people have seen the large fireball around the area 51 base, and that it might be used to deflect head seeking missiles if they were launched toward the air forces base near las vegas, but i don't know for sure.  the object moved slowly and silently.  i had never seen anything like it before.  i do not know what it was.
content.summary: Huge blazing dripping reddish orange burning fireball.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back deck looking skywards. i had my eyes trained on what looked like a particularly bright, white star very high up in the atmosphere. it was situated directly above me. i estimate that i had been looking at the object for about 45 seconds to a minute when it began to move in a slight pendulum-like motion. i thought that my percieved movement of the object was a result of atmospheric phenomena (ie. radiant cooling from the heat of the day). however, the object then moved with what looked like incredibly velocity just slightly to the left of where it had originally been located, stopped, and became completely stationary. it then began a series of extraordinarily swift start/stop movements to the right(again at what looked like an incredible speed) in a straight-line trajectory. it became stationary for another minute or so and then began manuvering (or more precisely darting) left to right/up and down in very sudden and precise movements. if i could best describe the movement of the object, i would say that its movements were almost geometric in nature. it then became stationary again and small spherical pulses of light began to appear and then dissapate around the craft. 

about 3 to 5 minutes after i witnessed the spherical pulses around the object, another object appeared overhead moving very slowly from west to east (my backyard faces east). i did not witness the approach of this second object until it was directly above me. this object was also white and spherical in shape, but it was much bigger and brighter than the first object. it also looked to be situated at a lower altitude than the first object. it became stationary almost directly overhead. the second object then gave off an incredible pulse of bright, white light. the pulse came directly from the object itself. it seemed to expand to twice it's original size and then shrank back to it's initial size a few seconds later. it then began to move left to right/up and down a in highly erratic fashion exactly like the first object. i watched both objects alternate between movement and non-movement for about 35 minutes before both objects lined up in an exact straight line from west to east. they then became completely stationary again. once stationary, i witnessed small spherical pulses of light appear and dissapate around both objects for another 5 minutes. at around the forty minute mark both objects shot off towards the northeast and i lost sight of both as the northeast corner of my backyard is heavily wooded with tall trees.

as for how i feel about witnessing this incredible phenomenon, i'm not quite sure exactly what to think. i work in the field of science and i am, by nature, a skeptical individual. my first instinct is to engage research. however, what i saw last night i may never be able to explain away in an emperical fashion. i think i am going to have to accept that not everything on this earth can be explained.
content.summary: Two spherical shaped objects, very high in altitude making quick, sharp aerodynamic movements and giving off pulses of light.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving southbound on the fl turnpike passing through west palm beach. on my way to work.I'm not sure of the year, but it was between 2000 and 2005. it was approximately 06:05 to 06:15, before sunrise.  the morning was overcast with low-lying clouds. i saw above me, just at the bottom edge of a low cloud, a green steady light, cigar-shaped with rounded ends.  it was a soft, steady light and remained for about 7 secs before disappearing into the cloud.  the light did not flash or strobe.  to compare with a field of vision, if you hold up a typical pen at arms length, only about half the length of the pen, would equate with the size of the light.  it was the shape, color, and non-strobing that caught my eye. i was curious, but not frightened. the palm beach airport is near the location.  i reported this when it happened to another ufo site, but lost the web address.
content.summary: Green light cigar-shaped but with rounded ends

content.detailedDescription: I was on the roof of a building, looking straight up at the stars at roughly 11:00 pm. suddenly just above the northern horizon, movement caught my eye. i turned my attention to right above the horizon, as i watched an illuminated sky-blue solid colored disc move from the northern horizon to the southern horizon in about 10 seconds, fading away as it approached the southern horizon. it appeared to be about the size of a frisbee, if one were to hold a frisbee at arms length away from ones' face. it seemed like it may have been traveling in the upper atmosphere, in which case it would have been rather large. it made no noise, just the lighted solid sky-blue color over the entire disc.
content.summary: Solid sky-blue oval disc

content.detailedDescription:
We live about 150 yards from i-25 at the eastern extreme of walsenburg, co.

i was walking out my friend's back door at about 9:30 pm wednesday night, and noticed a strange craft off flying to the east. this craft headed was originally southbound, about 10 miles east of walsenburg, at about 30,000 feet. 

it changed direction about the time i first spotted it... towards the southeast, or pinyon canyon. 

it was good size... as big or bigger than a jumbo... and i could hear it... about same noise as a jumbo.

i knew it was not a "faa legal" aircraft because of lack of red/green wingtip lamps. my dad was a naval aviator, and i was trained as an amateur astronomer starting at at age 13... i am 54 now. i always watch the skies carefully.

i called my friend out of his house, and he saw it also.

the craft's "nose" was a "bubble," seemingly lit from within... and amorphously so. the bubble was somewhat bigger than the grey area depicted on the sketch. one bright nav light was starboard and aft of that bubble... and the other white lights were at the rear of an  isosceles triangle. only one other lamp, a red flashing belly strobe light, could be seen.

it was moving only at about 500 mph... rather slow i thought.

it gradually flew out of sight aftar 3-5 minutes.

i felt it was not alien... but was maybe it was a us gov r&d craft.

will anderson
content.summary: Triangular craft seen over huerfano county co 8.19.09 at app. 2130 hrs

content.detailedDescription: I was staring at the clouds, while i was laying on my towel at the public pool. it was a partly cloudy day, and the clouds were moving north-east i believe. then i noticed two side-by-side metallic spheres moving the opposite direction that the clouds were moving. they seemed as if they might have been 15-25 feet in diameter. i blinked my eyes several times, and i even looked off to the side to make sure it wasn't bubbles in my eyes. it wasn't bubbles in my eyes because i could still see them with my peripheral vision. i watched them until they disappeared behind the treeline. i did a little research finding out that there were no weather balloons which looked like that. then i wrote it off knowing the truth wouldn't be disclosed anyway, anytime soon.
content.summary: Two metallic non-lighted spheres

content.detailedDescription: I was sunbathing at a pool. when i looked up i clearly saw a pulse jet with "a string of pearl like" white contrail. i am an amateur astronomer and i know how to identify objects. i have never seen anything like it before. i was kicking myself because i had no camera. there was also a commercial airliner near by and its contrail was normal, so i know it wasn't from upper winds.
content.summary: Aurora pulse jet seen.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a bright object over downtown austin texas last night around midnight 20090820.  the object was hovering around, i took a 30 second shutter speed picture on my camera to take a view of downtown and noticed the object.  i though it was an aircraft at first but couldn't see any faa lights, and flight pattern is different from a plane or helicopter.  the object just got brighter and when i went to get a timestamp for the tv, came out it was gone.

when i first saw the object, i ran inside to grab my camera and call my girlfriend out, she said she had to see to believe, she and believe now.  she couldn't control her feeling, saying scared and excited at the same time.  i was just excited, didn't feel scared at all. 

if you look at dsc_0042.Nef you will see the shutter speed was set at 30 seconds, and dsc_0045.Nef was set at 18 seconds.  the object in the right of the picture, just hovers straight line back and forth and when towards the left a bit more.  i can see planes and helicopters in the background, didn't come up right on the camera.  i'm a n00b with cameras.  give me a weapon and i can snipe a person in between their eyes at over 600m away.  so basically i gathered everything i can on video to *fill out a dd* form, what information is needed to make a report, timestamp, date, location/area and what happened.
content.summary: Orb shape object above austin texas

content.detailedDescription:
oragne ball


   as i was approaching the top of hill street in jessup, just before the stop sign at the luppini clock, as i looked up straight towards the casey highway as it merged with pa route 247 and i noticed a decending orange ball heading toward the little league municipal ball park hidden om the residual storm clouds as it had poured earlier and was about to do so again.
   the low lying clouds were up against this part of moosic mountain as the orange ball glowed through the gray dense fog type atomosphere decending like a parachute almost floating!
   my first thought was an approaching plane going into the scranton/wilkes-barre international airport after clearing the omni guidance tower atop archbald's salem road [elev 2200']as the orange ball was  too low [2000'] way under the normal approach elevation!
   as it approached me from the east i awaited it to change direction to the south west and it never did!
   it was then i realized this was something very different!
   the clock was 9:14 pm luppini time (only in jessup, pa).
   i traveled about 600' or so and pulled over as another car passed me as i was across an inspection station garage.
   i got out of the car as it was decending toward the ball parks high tension power lines that cut through the top area of the three field park.
   i could hear a electonic cracking noise like a mosqueto zapper uninterupted as it approach in the still quiet night!
   a sliver in the clouds opened up as i now had a clear shot!
   it was headed toward the tops of the high tension lines for sure!
   i was now looking straight up under it as if it were an ultra-lite aircraft.
   it was stepping downwardly by going forward and slightly upward in a jerking type motion about 50 feet and then dropping down at a steep slope very rappedly and then stopping.)similar to a moutain climber decending a steep incline).
   it was very very cautious and i believe aware of my presence. i observed this for about 8 to 10 downward steps now having decended to about 800' and still coming down!
   i rushed back in the car to dig out a 35 mm camera in the box in the back set and tried to get a shot leaving the setting already set on the camer as i had no light to see by!
   i missed the low point as it was already stepping back upwardly and i got one shot and rewound and then it down poured unbelieveably!
   the clouds immediately closed up and i dove in the car all wet!
   it first appeared about 1/2 the size of a car and then at its low point about the size of a car about 500' up in the air!
    multi colored as follows: 1) black nose, 2)then dark red behind that, 3) then orange behind that, 4) then bright white light behind that as it appeared to be a flattend ball mostly dark redish orange!
    it made no noise with exception to the carckeling zapping and moved very slowly in a floating like motion!
    i think that it was gathering the emfs from the top of the high tension power line like maybe recharging itself!
    others last forth of july fire works ingroups of 4 and 5 reported a similar event before and after the display!
    over the past 40 years their have been many white blob sightings usually under 200'.
     i felt as it it was alive and acted like an animal being feed from your back porch steps as it was so-so cautious and timmed as it knew enough not to contact the electrical high power lines in the fog like low lying rain clouds, but! needed to charge up or possibly die!
    i only wish i had my binoculars as i could have really seened the detail at its lowest point [maybe 400'].
    i went down the hill to the convient mart to see if the police men were there for their coffee but no one was around!
    i then proceed to frank's in simpson for a late snack another place were some type of ufo seem to come and go up the lackawanna river basin toward their head waters in arart, pa their apparant area of interest when traveling through!
    the total time of this sighting was about 5 minutes!

date: 8/10/09

    joseph r. caterina pe
    c/o 419 simpson street
    peckville, pa  18452
content.summary: Orange blob

content.detailedDescription: I was on i-70 comming from st. louis m.O on my way to denver, i had never been to kansas before so i was very interested in the scenery so my eyes were every where.  i was heading west obviously and to my left i saw an object in the sky that at first i believed was some sort of kite, as i am studying it as well as getting closer, i reduced my speed from about 70 to 60, to notice that this was no kite because there are no strings attached to it and if it was a kite it was the biggest wierdest kite i had ever seen, and being from the beach thats saying something.  i'm a little slow times and it all happened so fast, but anyways as soon as noticed there were no strings attached, it basically started going straight up higher into the air and started moving towards a big cloud, where it entered and vanished, it almost looked like it just took off going so fast no body would be-able to see it.  once this happened i started freaking out like no [cms/tg/pd] way did i just see that, started checking my rear views, looking back constantly not having a care in the world about wrecking, and nothing was in the sky but the clouds.....As far as the shape goes what checked if you put all those things together thats what i would say it looked like, like i said i thought it was a kite at first, but it's color was like a charcoal black/greyish color, it's hard for me to describe because it all happened to fast and i was basically in shock so yea, this is the first time i have ever seen anything i thought to be a ufo like for sure, i'v seen low flying planes before and thought was a ufo but then minutes later noticed it was just a plane.  hope this fiasco gets figured out in my lifetime....
content.summary: Saw a object in the sky i have never seen before.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, young son and i were headed towards macon georgia from savannah georgia, west on on i-16 at about 1 am back in 1999.  i was working as an apprentice in savannah a few days of the week, and had brought my family along this time.


the highway was very quiet, only a few cars and big trucks headed east, and we felt very alone heading west for some reason. there were a few cars headed west ahead of and behind us for a while, and then we were all alone.  i could see tail lights about a mile or so in front of me.

we were just outside of dublin georgia when suddenly, i see what i think are bright lights from someone's head lamps shining into my eyes through the rear view mirror. it looked like one solid large white light, but i was assuming that the two headlamps were blurred together at such a distance.  as it slowly got closer, the light just got bigger rather than distinguishing itself as headlamps.  it was one solid light.

the wife and i start going over what it could be, when suddenly, it changes into the east bound lane of the interstate, headed west!  we start to think that maybe it is a train, with one large light on the front, but then realize that a train wouldnt cross the interstate.  it stays in the eastbound lane heading west for about 10 minutes or so, and then comes back into the westbound lane behind me once again.

at this time, we're totally baffled by what it can be.  i tell my wife that i'm going to stop the car and see if it catches up to us.  she tells me this isnt a good idea on an interstate, but i stop the car anyway, against her wishes.  it had been following us for so long, and hadnt gained on us much at all.

so i stop the car, in the middle of the interstate, and the huge light appears to stop as well.  we turn in our seats and stare out the back wind shield.  we're totally baffled by what it could be at this point.  i was still clinging to the idea of "train" until i stopped the car and it stopped behind us.  at the stopped position, i'd estimate that it was a mile or so behind us, and huge.  and bright.  the light never blinked or faltered. constant and very bright.

i start moving again, and it maintains this distance for 5 or 10 more minutes.  it shoots back across the interstate into the east bound lane headed west a few more times, before it shoots back into the west bound lane behind me, and then off into the trees that line the interstate and it was gone.

we didnt see the object again until about 15 minutes later when we were exiting i-16 onto highway 96.  upon exiting, while driving up the exit ramp, a huge light flashed on and back off very quickly about three times.  it was so bright that everything was light.  it was as if someone was playing with the stadium light switch, only the stadium lights were positioned in the trees along side the exit ramp and aimed directly at my car. flash flash flash in succession, very quickly.  and then it was gone.  

we talked about this with one another, my wife and i, for the next week or so.  we couldnt wrap our mind around it then, and still cant today.  i wish i would have been paying closer attention to the clock.  if there was any missed time, i'm unaware, and if we were contacted, i cant remember.  these are the actual events and i have been very reluctant to talk about it until now.  i would be willing to recount this story to a mufon investigator.
content.summary: Chased by ufo 1999

content.detailedDescription:
While trying to fix my telescope on the ring nebulae, i took my eye off the eyepiece and looked up @ the south west sky. two very bright orange objects moving very slow almost as if decending. within milliseconds of first seeing they were both moving faster north east not far from eachother. i scrambled to set my scope on any of the 2, i managed to get one object in my scope. i tracked it for approx 4 sec than i moved it ahead to maybe catch the second one. the object never re-appeared ahead of itself where i had my scope fixed. i looked up and they were both gone.
i couldnt make out any significant detail on the object. it wasn't as bright in the telescope. i knew right away that they were not stars or satellites. i held my breathe during most of the sighting. very interesting night.
content.summary: 2 bright orange object from the south west heading north east

content.detailedDescription:
i actually think this is a flying bug that went by my lense. but is does look interesting. when i took this photo i only seen the bird. but i do remember lots of bugs flying around, so that is what i figure it was. and possably many photo's are the same if i'm right. i shot this with a panasonic dmc-fz30 focal length 43.3mm. i know this for fact because i looked up the details in the photo today to find the proper date and it also had some other info in the photo.
 although i do believe in ufo's i really don't think this is more then a fly or something in that nature. but back in 1978 or 79 my exwife and i seen an incredible amount of flying lights of crows nest lake in alberta canada. i was going to pull over and have a look but my exwife reached over with her foot and laid on the gas. this took place at about 2am i believe it was the fall of 78 or spring of 79. i son't quit remember. but our son was under a year old and we traveled to alberta to see a eye specialist for him. i have always wondered what we seen. there were hunderds of light flooting in the sky made it look like it was just about daytime.
 this is why i do believe but never was able to see a shape of what i saw so how knows. but i truly believe the object in the bird photo is nothing more then a bug flying by. i actually named this photo ufo. and i posted it on rendersity under the user name michif. i also said in that posting that i believe it to be a bug flying by. my time zone is mountain time, was'nt to sure of the of the abrv. on that
content.summary: Taking photo of a bird

content.detailedDescription:
Sometime between christmas and january 14th (my enlistment date) i was walking with my girlfriend through a field and telling her of my decision to join the army, the night was clear and we were walking facing the west. in the sky a star seemed to form and expand and "explode" (there was no sound), an expanding ring of light was left behind , much like a wake when a pebble is dropped in the water.There was no distance relationship to make, it looked initially like a star so there was a mental assumption.
she has asked me about it since.
i am not a believer in "extra-terrestrials" or "spaceships" , this was a phenomena i have never been able to explain, my best explanation has been some kind of missile or rocket testing in nevada during this time period and landing in the ocean. this is not intended to "report" anything, i am seeking information that would connect this sighting to something ordinary.
content.summary: A star seemed to form and explode leaving an expanding ring of light

content.detailedDescription: Well, to start from the beginning i'll have to go back a little over a year ago.  the first weekend in august of 2008 i received a phone call from a friend of mine at about 10:30 pm mst.  he told me that he was all of a sudden a believer like me.  i couldn't believe what i was hearing because he was as much of a sceptic as anyone.  he told me he had just witnessed two bright objects in the sky, which at first he thought was an airplane, that was until they spread apart and one became brighter than the other.  i got pretty excited and i went out onto my deck to see if i could observe this and it wasn't three minutes later that i spotted something high in the sky.  now this event occurred in duchess alberta, the object was moving south to north and it looked like a satellite; only without blinking lights.  all of a sudden another object with the very same characteristics crossed the first objects' path going west to east, as i looked around the clear starry sky i spotted no less than six of these objects in a 15 minute span moving in every possible direction.  i was so amazed that i woke up my 7 month pregnant wife (who is also a sceptic) to come take a look.  at first she tried to pass it off as a plane, but when a real plane flew over head she could clearly see the difference.  we watched these things almost every night for the whole month of august, not even exaggerating, and then we moved an hour north to my current resident in hanna.  the recent sighting i'm reporting is the same objects, a couple of peculiar things happened on this night, my wide and i were out on the deck again and watching the very starry sky and not to our surprise we spotted a lot of these star like objects flying around, one crossed flight paths with a jet, it was obviously at a higher altitude, but as it crossed the path of the plane it lit up brighter than every other star in the sky, then it went dim and carried on.  a few minutes later i witnessed two of these objects moving from south to north in unison, always keeping the same distance between them, i was curious to know if it was two ends to the same object, so i watched it until i could see a star in between them and i did.  i know this is long winded, but i've witnessed probably 200 or more of these things over the past year and i have no explanation.  the night i am reporting about, i counted 18 in less than 30 minutes.
content.summary: Star like objects moving in every direction

content.detailedDescription:
Me and 3 other people were sitting on a beach in milford ct, with houses along it, when all of a sudden i saw a huge, orange, glowing ball rise straight up in the air from the distance of about a mile. i gasped and everyone turned and looked. there was another group of people on the beach sitting several yards away, and they also saw it and began yelling. at first i thought it was a meteor on fire, although it didnt have a tail, and began gaining, rather than losing altitude.
    after rising into the air, it began travelling parallel to the beach, heading directly towards us. it must of been at a very high altitude because a commercial plane passed beneath it, and you could tell the object was much higher than the plane, but still massive. 
    it soon was directly overhead, and you could see the bottom of it, shaped like a disc, and lit up entirely orange. the light seemed to be pulsating. after it passed over head it took a sharp upward turn, and we watched go higher and higher, so high that it was the size pinprick when it dissapeared. when we first saw it it was bigger than a beach ball. 
    when kit began travelling towards us we were all freaked out, and i ran towards it so i could see it from a different angle, to see if it was possibly a plane,which it was pretty obvious it wasnt ( the light was orange as opposed to white, and once i saw it from directly beneath it it was clearly some sort of circle). simply put, it was a huge glowing ball, with what appeared to be a sold epicenter that was giving off the light.
content.summary: Large orange glowing
